body.name: Travel Crib,3 in 1 Portable Crib for Baby, Lightweight Pack and Play for Babies and Toddler, Foldable Travel Baby Playpen with Comfortable Mattress and Carry Bag(Dark Grey)

features: 3 in1 Travel Crib--① Infant Portable Crib: The Infant Crib Perfect for an afternoon nap and even approved for overnight sleeping.② Baby Playpen: Unzip the side zipper to remove the travel bassinet to have an capacious baby playard,give babies space for freedom and happiness③baby bassinet: The bassinet mode is perfect for newborns and can double as a bedside bassinet.

Lightweight and Portable Baby Bed--The 3D Z-folding technology making it extremely compact ,whether it's for outdoor use, car trips, et，it is a must-have ideal travel companion for babies and toddlers.The net weight is only 17.2 lbs，and the tool-free design can be installed within 1 minute, Its lightweight design makes transport a breeze, and its ease of assembly and disassembly is unrivaled

Convenient Side Zipper Door-- The sides of the baby playpen are made of soft and breathable mesh, allowing you to see every adorable movement of your baby. You can also interact with and care for your little one easily through the side zipper door.

Stable and Durable Double Layer Travel Crib--The trapezoidal structure of the travel crib provides exceptional stability and safety. It grows with your child from newborn to toddler, meeting their growing needs. The advanced ergonomically designed mattress offers optimal support and comfort, ensuring your baby enjoys sweet dreams.

Service Assurance- Your satisfaction is our greatest honor,we provide 30-day Return/Replacement Service.If you are not satisfied FOR ANY REASON, please contact our Customer Support and we will reply you within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SPORARY 3 IN 1 PORTABLE TRAVEL CRIB Sporary - Where Dreams Begin Once upon a time, in a world filled with imagination and wonder, there was a brand called Sporary. They dedicated themselves to creating the finest children's beds with utmost care and thoughtful design. Each bed was crafted with precision, focusing on quality and safety. Sporary understood the importance of a good night's sleep for children's growth, so they strived to provide a cozy, secure, and magical sleeping environment. With a brand philosophy rooted in "love and care," Sporary nurtured every child's journey. Choose Sporary and let dreams come alive, as they believe that every dream begins with a perfect bed.

Newborn bassinet The bassinet mode is perfect for newborns and can double as a bedside bassinet. Infant Crib Perfect for an afternoon nap and even approved for overnight sleeping Baby Playpen Unzip the side zipper to remove the travel bassinet to have an capacious baby playard,give babies space for freedom and happiness

What's in the box: 1 x Portable Baby Playpen1 x Adjustable Soft Mattress Pad1 x Carry bag Specification: Applicable age: 0-24 months Folded Size: 23*9*9 inches Gross Weight: 8.2 kg/18.7 lbs Applicable weight: up to 33lbs

Breathable Mesh Maintain air circulation to make baby's breathing more comfortable Soft mattress Soft and supportive mattress to protect baby's spinal growth Carry Bag Extremely compact design makes your travel anywhere convenient without worrying

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good for traveling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for easy travel
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use on overnight trips. I was looking for something more compact than a traditional play pen, and this is perfect! The color is nice (light gray), the material seems good quality and overall it appears sturdy. So far, I would say this is a must have if you have a baby and you tend to travel often.The bassinet weight limit is 25 lbs, which is pretty common for any basinet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is hands down one of the best things we got for our baby. We had the issue of not having a safe place for her to sleep when out, so now this just stays in the trunk and we never have to worry about it again. Folds up great and has a nice travel bag. Literally just an all in one thing. Good metal piping to so its sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and portable
reviews.reviewText: This little crib is very lightweight, makes it easily portable, so much lighter than our pack and play! It's quick and easy to set up and break down, and feels like a good enough quality to last a while. We plan to keep this in the car so we have it handy whenever the need arises while visiting friends and family. It takes up so little room, and comes with its own carrying case. Exactly what we were looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves it
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my son for our Disney trip. The hotel we're staying at only has playpens, which isn't sleep safe, so got him this! He loves it so far.As far as putting it together and taking it down, so easy! He hasn't slept in it yet but he has enjoyed playing in it. Bigger than I expected too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and portable
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this playpen for traveling purposes for our 1 year old son. It works absolutely perfectly for this! It is lightweight and easy to transport, and very easy to assemble. Our son sleeps well in it and we are pleased with it for that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Travel crib with easy assembly!
reviews.reviewText: This travel crib was so easy to use straight out of the box! The setup literally took just a few minutes. The soft gray color with the adorable puppy design is gender neutral and could be used for multiple children over the years. I especially like that it has an upper bassinet level that you can use for infants, and the mattress has a panel that just zips off so that it fits in the smaller upper level. The zipper doorway on the bottom is cute to allow toddlers to crawl in/out. Some people might not like that the bottom of the crib sits flat on the ground, but I don't mind. This is a wonderful, easy to use travel crib, and I wouldn't hesitate to order it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for travel
reviews.reviewText: This bassinet has made travel for our family a lot easier. It's super easy to fold up and store and it's not as big as other ones I've used so it fits better in a hotel room. This is a must-get if you travel a lot.
